titles.title: A bill to modify the unconditional ownership requirement for women-owned and minority-owned small business concerns for purposes of procurement contracts with the Small Business Administration, and for other purposes.
Women and Minority Equity Investment Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.
